data.name: Colorado Cocoa Club Artbook
data.detailed_description: Re-live the romance of "Colorado Cocoa Club" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this romance dating sim visual novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!
data.about_the_game: Re-live the romance of "Colorado Cocoa Club" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this romance dating sim visual novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!
data.short_description: Re-live the romance of "Colorado Cocoa Club" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this romance dating sim visual novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
